languages.text: {n}Идира понуро смотрит на толпу оборванцев.{/n} "Помнится, в детстве, на родной планете, когда весь район без пайков остался, мы так же пытались в местную лавочку пробиться... тамошние сразу стрелять стали. Хех, не думала, что на Футфоле такие терпимые дуболомы в охранниках ходят..."

{n}Idira observes the rabble dismally.{/n} "Back when I was a kid on my home planet, a whole district was left without rations, so we tried to pull this kind of stunt on a local shop... The owners just started shooting, no questions asked. Hah. Never took Footfall's wardens for pushovers..."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира понуро смотрит на толпу оборванцев.{/n} "Помнится, в детстве, на родной планете, когда весь район без пайков остался, мы так же пытались в местную лавочку пробиться... тамошние сразу стрелять стали. Хех, не думала, что на Футфоле такие терпимые дуболомы в охранниках ходят..."

languages.text: {n}イディラは憂鬱そうに群衆を眺めている。{/n}「私が幼かったころ、母星ではどの地区でも食料不足で、地元の店でこんなことをしたものだったわ…店主は問答無用ですぐに撃ち始めるの。フッ。フットフォールのウォーデンたちはカモにはしなかったけど…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira observes the rabble dismally.{/n} "Back when I was a kid on my home planet, a whole district was left without rations, so we tried to pull this kind of stunt on a local shop... The owners just started shooting, no questions asked. Hah. Never took Footfall's wardens for pushovers..."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは憂鬱そうに群衆を眺めている。{/n}「私が小さかったころ、母星ではどの地区でも食料不足で、地元の店でこんなことをしたものだったわ…店主は問答無用ですぐに撃ち始めるの。フッ。フットフォールのウォーデンたちはカモにはしなかったけど…」

languages.text: {n}Idira observe les pauvres gens d'un air sombre.{/n} « Quand j'étais gamine, tout un quartier s'était retrouvé privé de rations une fois, alors on a tenté un coup de ce genre avec une boutique locale... Les propriétaires se sont mis à tirer, sans même une sommation. Ha. Je n'aurais jamais cru que les gardiens de Castel se laisseraient faire... »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira observes the rabble dismally.{/n} "Back when I was a kid on my home planet, a whole district was left without rations, so we tried to pull this kind of stunt on a local shop... The owners just started shooting, no questions asked. Hah. Never took Footfall's wardens for pushovers..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira observe les pauvres gens d'un air sombre.{/n} « Quand j'étais gamine, tout un quartier s'était retrouvé privé de rations une fois, alors on a tenté un coup de ce genre avec une boutique locale... Les propriétaires se sont mis à tirer, sans même une sommation. Ha. Je n'aurais jamais cru que les gardiens de Castel se laisseraient faire comme ça... »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉悲伤地看着这群暴民。{/n}“我还只是个孩子的时候，我的故乡一整片地区都爆发了饥荒，于是我们不得不在当地的商店搞这么一出……结果店主问都不问，直接开枪了。哈，他们可别以为落脚港的守卫都是好欺负的软脚虾……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira observes the rabble dismally.{/n} "Back when I was a kid on my home planet, a whole district was left without rations, so we tried to pull this kind of stunt on a local shop... The owners just started shooting, no questions asked. Hah. Never took Footfall's wardens for pushovers..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉悲伤地看着这群暴民。{/n}“我记得我还只是个孩子的时候，我的故乡一整片地区都爆发了饥荒，于是我们不得不在当地的商店搞这么一出……结果店主问都不问，直接开枪了。哈，他们可别以为落脚港的守卫都是好欺负的软脚虾……”

languages.text: {n}Idira betrachtet trübsinnig die Menge.{/n} "Als ich ein Kind war, auf meinem Heimatplaneten, da hatte mal ein ganzer Distrikt keine Rationen mehr, also haben wir so eine Aktion wie hier bei einem örtlichen Geschäft versucht. Die Besitzer haben sofort das Feuer eröffnet, ohne Fragen zu stellen. Ha! Wer hätte gedacht, dass die Wächter von Footfall Schwächlinge sind ...?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira observes the rabble dismally.{/n} "Back when I was a kid on my home planet, a whole district was left without rations, so we tried to pull this kind of stunt on a local shop... The owners just started shooting, no questions asked. Hah. Never took Footfall's wardens for pushovers..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira betrachtet trübsinnig die Menge.{/n} "Als ich noch ein Kind war, auf meinem Heimatplaneten, da hatte mal ein ganzer Distrikt keine Rationen mehr, also haben wir so eine Aktion wie hier bei einem örtlichen Geschäft versucht. Die Besitzer haben sofort das Feuer eröffnet, ohne Fragen zu stellen. Ha! Wer hätte gedacht, dass die Wächter von Footfall Schwächlinge sind ...?"

languages.text: {n}Idira observa a la plebe con una expresión sombría.{/n} «Cuando era niña, un distrito de mi planeta se quedó sin raciones y tuvimos que hacer esto en una tienda... Los dueños se pusieron a disparar sin más. Nunca imaginé que los guardias de Paso fueran tan permisivos...».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira observes the rabble dismally.{/n} "Back when I was a kid on my home planet, a whole district was left without rations, so we tried to pull this kind of stunt on a local shop... The owners just started shooting, no questions asked. Hah. Never took Footfall's wardens for pushovers..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira observa a la plebe con una expresión sombría.{/n} «En mi planeta, cuando era niña, un distrito se quedó sin raciones y tuvimos que hacer esto en una tienda... Los dueños se pusieron a disparar sin más. Nunca imaginé que los guardias de Paso fueran tan permisivos...».

languages.text: {n}İdira sıkıntıyla ayaktakımını gözlüyor.{/n} "Ben çocukken gezegenimde koca bir bölge erzaksız kalmıştı, biz de oradaki bir esnafa benzeri bir girişimde bulunmuştuk ama... Sahipleri sorgusuz sualsiz ateş etmeye başlamıştı. Hıh, Binliman muhafızlarını böyle enayi bilmezdim."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira observes the rabble dismally.{/n} "Back when I was a kid on my home planet, a whole district was left without rations, so we tried to pull this kind of stunt on a local shop... The owners just started shooting, no questions asked. Hah. Never took Footfall's wardens for pushovers..."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, ayaktakımını sıkıntıyla gözlüyor.{/n} "Ben çocukken gezegenimde koca bir bölge erzaksız kalmıştı, biz de oradaki bir esnafa benzeri bir girişimde bulunduk ama... Sahipleri sorgusuz sualsiz ateş etmeye başladı. Hıh, Binliman muhafızlarını böyle enayi bilmezdim."
